messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sudbury Valley in the news
messages.msgSnippet: I am in VT but I go to the Princeton area often. Hope you find Mass. people Demetria http://www.demetria.com ... From: Kerry Kibort  To:
messages.messageBody:
I am in VT but I go to the Princeton area often.
Hope you find Mass. people
Demetria
http://www.demetria.com

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kerry Kibort" <kkibort@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 2:47 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sudbury Valley in the news


> Are there any Massachusetts unschoolers on this list?
> I'd really like to be in touch with someone here.
> Kerry

> >
> > Seamus

messages.subject: Sudbury Valley in the news
messages.msgSnippet: Sudbury Valley School (an unschool in Framingham, MA) will be on 60 Minutes in early Feb.  They are there filming right now.  Keep an eye out for it, and I ll
messages.messageBody:
Sudbury Valley School (an unschool in Framingham, MA) will be on 60
Minutes in early Feb. They are there filming right now. Keep an eye
out for it, and I'll post as soon as I know the details.

Seamus
